CREATE TABLE icon (    id    INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ASC AUTOINCREMENT,    code  INTEGER NOT NULL,    type  TINYINT NOT NULL  DEFAULT (0),    title VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE user_icon (    id   INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ASC AUTOINCREMENT,    icon_id  INTEGER,    order_no INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT (1) );
CREATE TABLE project (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,name VARCHAR,ctime INT);
CREATE TABLE account (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY ASC AUTOINCREMENT,ctime BIGINT NOT NULL,icon_id BIGINT NOT NULL,remark VARCHAR,value DOUBLE,project_id INTEGER NOT NULL);
